title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\SetLabelsRequest
name: SetLabelsRequest
description:
SetLabelsRequest sets the Google Cloud Platform labels on a Google Container Engine cluster, which will in turn set them for Google Compute Engine resources used by that cluster

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.SetLabelsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Deprecated. The Google Developers Console project ID or project number. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the Google Compute Engine zone in which the cluster resides. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.cluster_id
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the cluster. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.resource_labels
params.description: Required. The labels to set for that cluster.

params.name: data.label_fingerprint
params.description: Required. The fingerprint of the previous set of labels for this resource, used to detect conflicts. The fingerprint is initially generated by Kubernetes Engine and changes after every request to modify or update labels. You must always provide an up-to-date fingerprint hash when updating or changing labels. Make a get() request to the resource to get the latest fingerprint.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name (project, location, cluster name) of the cluster to set labels. Specified in the format projects/*/locations/*/clusters/*.

methods.name: getLabelFingerprint
methods.description:
Required. The fingerprint of the previous set of labels for this resource, used to detect conflicts. The fingerprint is initially generated by Kubernetes Engine and changes after every request to modify or update labels. You must always provide an up-to-date fingerprint hash when updating or changing labels. Make a get() request to the resource to get the latest fingerprint.

Generated from protobuf field string label_fingerprint = 5 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
